name: Atomaders
summary: Make you way through enemy attack waves in your task of liberating planet systems from alien cyborgs invasion. Feel an unconquerable power of your weaponry while destroying cyborgs and obtaining extra-weapons. Feel the pride when a mighty command ship falls to pieces under your fire finding the only vulnerable place. You're gonna atomize or you're gonna be atomized!
info:
• 别名: 核战小蜜蜂
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2002年11月
  • 官方网站: https://www.kraisoft.com/arcade-games/atomaders/
